1.heading: Duty
1.raw:
First lines always tell you the truth of a hexagram. Here, the truth is Duty. Overview line: The ability to confront any challenge without expectations. Because this is an overview line, this is something that is
going to be learned. Because we have a lower trigram, it is not personal. Remember that this is the gate of the aura. We have the most powerful auras in the fourth and fifth lines and very contained auras in the
first three lines. In other words, only when they are met by something is there this impression of their large aura.

In fact, that is not an aura that is moving outwards. It is an aura that is being contained because the process is an inward one. This ability to confront any challenge, to be able to accept any place within the
spectrum of extremes, is very important. The love of humanity is not about loving your neighbor, which is tough business. It is not about that. It is about being yourself. This generates love in the world.

Venus exalted. Harmonic relationships which give support for the fulfillment of any task. What we know about first lines is that, not only are they not transpersonal, but they are introspective; they are looking
inwards. You will discover that, in the 15th gate, there are a lot of strange things. You also meet them in the 46th gate. They are very odd.This first line is deeply personal but not personal in the sense that it is
looking outwards for relationships. It is personal in the sense that it is deeply concerned about what relationships are all about. How do you make a relationship harmonic? In other words: how do you get
people not to interfere with your extreme?

Everything about the lower trigram for people who have the 15th gate is that they can be deeply disturbed by people who interfere with their rhythm. Their harmonic relationship is not about how they can have a
harmonic relationship with others, but how they can find others who have a harmonic relationship with them and let them be their extreme so that humanity is balanced.

When someone is an extremist and you try to stop them (you give them Valium, or you lock them up), you thus destroy a piece of love in the world. It sounds funny but it is true. The love of humanity can only
exist when all of the extremes are permitted, when human beings get to live out their actual nature.

Mars in detriment. Alienation engendered through exaggerated claims. In white book: The capacity of the
Self to confront any challenge through extreme and harmonic relationships; or The capacity of the Self to alienate others through extremes. All of this is about the social context. The person who is a first line
extremist does not even know that other people think that he is an extremist until he is told. For them, it runs into difficulties because they are always looking for a way to live out their extreme.

2.heading: Influence
2.raw:
This is an unusual second line because it is an exalted second line for the very reason that most second lines are in a vulnerable position: because other people can always see into them. If you are an extremist
and people can see that you are an extremist, it is likely that they will leave you alone. It is likely that they won't interfere with your extremism. This second line has the capacity for being influential. Remember
that the 15/5 goes right down to the cellular level. It is absolutely essential that we have diversity in rhythms. It is absolutely essential that extremists live out their extreme roles. Otherwise, we do not have
the opportunity to see what genetic rhythm is really of value for the totality. The second line is called
Influence. There is no overview line. The extremism is right there from the beginning. It does not take time.

Page 2

The Sun exalted. Modesty and right action result in enduring standards. The ancient Chinese considered the 15th hexagram to be perfect. All of the six lines, to the ancient Chinese, are exalted simply because
this is the core of what it is to be alive in the world. So, that 'enduring standard' is to be oneself. Right action is to follow one's extreme. I tell people, if they are busy, run. If you are not busy, sleep. It is okay.
Honor your extreme. The whole thing with the second line is that it does not know that it is extreme. It is just living it out, but other people see the extremism.

If you have a 15.2 that comes to your office for a steady job, you will not hire them. You may not know why you will not hire them. It is not that you say, "This one is unreliable." Something inside of you (they
have a strong aura) says to you, "Do not hire this person; they will quit next week."

In the white book: The capacity of the Self to accept its extreme nature as correct. It is very beautiful for these people. Where they become the paper tigers is the moment that somebody sees that they are extreme
and actually tries to change that: some 17 year-old that is dying from junk and everybody wants to save that person's life. Quotation of Jesus: "Only my father knows what is clean." Who is to judge the way we
come or the way we go?"

The Earth in detriment. Where the Sun's actions are natural, the Earth's are contrived, though given the power of this position, the some effect can be expected. The capacity to use the extreme nature of the Self
to influence others. These are people that finally go get found out. They are extremists; they realize that they can use that to their advantage. It is still the same thing. They stay with their extremism. That is
healthy. Don't break these people of their extreme rhythms. Encourage them to love their rhythms.

3.heading: Ego inflation
3.raw:
At the end of the lower trigram here, you end up with difficulties. This line is a real trial and error line and it really goes through quite a dilemma with that. What often happens to 15.3's is that they do not live out
their natural extreme rhythm. They find an extreme within themselves that is effective in dealing with others and they hang onto that extreme as a way of dealing with others, rather than going through their
own natural process, which means to be extreme and not.

Here, in the third line, we have this confusion that comes in the self, where suddenly you see the appearance of ego. The confusion is between what is natural and comes to us choicelessly and what the
ego claims to be its own. This is the attempt to control extreme behavior in order to protect oneself.
Remember, third lines do not know that there is something else on the other side. They don't know that there is a 5 waiting there to lock it into a pattern. So, of course they have to adapt but what they learn is
that they do not have to adapt to certain types if they keep to a certain kind of extreme behavior.

The risk that modesty, once recognized, will self-destruct. The Earth exalted and this is a very funny exalted. The 15th and 46th gate have very strange lines. Where the otherwise negative contrived
modesty... In other words: this is extremism that becomes a negative because the person relies on that extreme to manipulate others, rather than just going through a natural flow.. ..is here reinforced by
recognition and maintained as an effective strategy.

For example: somebody finds that it is very effective for them always to be late, even though it is not necessarily natural for them to be late, but it becomes an effective strategy for them to use with other
people. This is a 15.3 trait, using extremism in a negative way rather than just living out their extreme.
What that means is that they are being conditioned away from their true extreme rhythm and they are being conditioned to work with just one rhythm to protect themselves in their trial and error process. So,

Page 3

this is a very strange exalted. Those people who think that exalted lines are all wonderful: have the 15.3 exalted and see what it is likel

Mercury in detriment. The 'I told you so' mentality. The moment that you recognize how an extreme works, you can predict its effects. Third lines lead to wisdom in the sixth line. This can be very clever.
This is someone who can really see somebody else's extreme strategy. "I knew they would do that. I told you that."

Ego inflation. The extremism of the Self as a strategy to control the flow. But remember, that is a conditioned extreme, not their natural extreme. On the other side: The capacity of the Self to point out the
extremes of others. Like all things, it does not mean that that is inherently negative. It simply means that that is really a process. It is an overview line. It is going to take time. When I was teaching kids, they
developed extreme techniques in order to get attention. They waited for this extreme technique to work.
They yelled for instance. It is just that kind of thing.

4.heading: The Wallflower
4.raw:
When we come to the upper trigram, we are dealing with a gate that represents humanity, that in its nature releases or manifests what we call love in terms of humanity, that is in a collective logical circuit which is
fundamentally social to begin with, and you are dealing with transpersonal gates.

So, obviously, you are dealing with, particularly in the fourth and fifth lines, a very deep social mechanism and yet, at the same time, it is here in this fourth line that you see the underlying dilemma that
we find in all fourth lines. It is the underlying dilemma that is also in the 18.4, that is the deep inadequacy that always accompanies a fourth line.

Fourth lines are really a perfect binary. On one side, they are enormously influential because that one- tracked, fixed focusing is so powerful. Yet, on the other side, by being one -tracked and fixed, there are so
many other things that are not part of one's process. There are so many other possibilities that are left behind. And, unlike the lower trigram that is always ready to meet and to deal with the surprise of the
other side, the fourth line knows it is there and it feels inadequate.

This is one of the most deeply inadequate of all lines in the I'Ching. These people feel inadequate because all they can ever do is externalize their extreme and they always feel like they are out of place until they
find an environment, or a relationship, in which they are part of the flow and their extreme fits in. When their extreme fits in, they can finally feel okay about the nature of who they are.

But remember, when you are looking at lines, you have to think about the children that came into the world carrying them. 15.4 children can end up with a deep sense of inadequacy in their life because this is
the collective line that most resembles what it is to be individual. In other words, this is the collective line that can feel like a freak. It can feel out of place because it is fixed in its extreme.

It is called The Wallflower. Modesty as a shield against exposure of inadequacy. Jupiter exalted. A genuine form that may or may not mask inadequacies. Saturn in detriment. An ultimately weak defense
leading to exposure and humiliation. Somebody can be fixed in their extreme and not be inadequate, even though, as a person, they can feel inadequate. When they find the flow, that sense of inadequacy will go
away, but in the detriment, the sense of inadequacy is pushed in their face long before they get a chance to really find themselves. Again, please understand that their aura is very powerful and they can find their
flow.

Page 4

In the white book: The uncomfortableness of the Self when it is out of the flow (by being extreme and fixed); or Extremism that keeps the Self out of the flow (and the sense of humiliation). Nowhere worse
than when a child is in school. Remember to look at a line with the perception of it being a child because you get a real picture of the adult. This deeply collective child felt out of place, looking for where it could
find relationships so that it could feel in the flow.

5.heading: Sensitivity
5.raw:
Fifth lines are what society wants to see a hexagram as being. It is about Sensitivity. Because the fifth line gets projected on that it is the extremist and that it is capable of extremes, it is also capable of rising to the
occasion or not. In other words, the fifth line has a kind of advantage, as many fifth lines do, that it does not have to be an extremist but it can certainly be an extremist when it is projected on that it is time to be
extreme. This is the way society likes it.

What society likes is the possibility that extremism can be tampered with in some way, based on the environment. For example: it is an historical phenomenon that we send young, relatively fresh, innocent
boys into wars and we tell them to become killing freaks. We turn them into extremes and then we expect them to turn that off when they come back because the environment does not require that anymore. All
these very gentle and noble people who, for centuries, were very polite and distinguished and then they go out in the battlefield and go absolutely nuts. Society likes the idea that an extreme is something that can
be handy when you need it but it can be torn down if the environment does not require it.

Here the line is called Sensitivity. The ability to sense when otherwise balanced behavior must be adjusted to meet the requirements of a changing environment. Jupiter exalted. The power to grow. In
other words, these people learn to live out their extremes in a way that is not offensive to the totality.
These people have big auras. If others come and project on them, the aura is reinforced. If you have a 15.3 and a 15.5, the 15.5 is the one that will get the attention first. It is projected on them. So they learn to deal
with that.

Pluto in detriment. The tendency to overcompensate. In other words, to go from one extreme to another just to satisfy the needs and demands of the conditioning environment. This can take them out of what is
natural for them. We have learned something in the 7.5, The General, which was that the fifth line always has to wait for the call in order for it to be the one that calls. It has to wait for the right moment in time
because everything is a matter of time.

So, the whole thing is that it is not just when the environment changes that the extremism in the 15.5 balances or alters itself. It is when it is the right time in that changed environment that it has its greatest
impact because, remember, these people are magnetic people. They bring us into the rhythms.

Every single one of us here are the by-product of 15 conditioning. All of us. We have all been conditioned that way from the very beginning. Every line of the 46 is conditioning. They are all conditioning lines.
We all get conditioned by all of the people that have the 15 and that represent our spectrum.

Think about that. If all the people that have the 15th gate don't live out their extreme nature because of the conditions of society, you strip away love from the world. You destroy the aura of the world. That is a
fact. This is what we deal with. The love of humanity is having a society that is ordered enough and organized enough that all of the extremes are not extremes anymore, but just a place in the spectrum.
There has to be a place in the spectrum for all of those things and then we generate a healthy aura as a human society. The 15's are deeply conditioned by society.

Page 5

By the way, the 15's have their revenge. You condition the 15 not to be extreme but the 15 still controls you in its aura. It has its powers.

In the white book: The capacity of the Self to grow through experiencing the extremes; or The drive of the Self to overcompensate and disturb the flow.

6.heading: Self-defense
6.raw:
We have seen, all along, the quality of the sixth line, which is that it rarely participates, other than when it is young, in the nature of the hexagram. We have seen that sixth lines sit up there on the roof of the house
and look out over everything and they wonder, "Why bother?" Here, you have a case that is extreme in its nature, which is only in the gates of extremes. When the 15.6 has finished its business, the next step is to
become the 52.1. The 52nd gate is Keeping Still Mountain. It is about being focused and concentrated. It is about passive energy and the first line is called Think before you speak, which is the foundation of what
it is to be still. The foundation of what it is to be still is to wait and to wait until one has the possibility of clarity.

Being that the 52nd gate is the root pressure of the logical process and that we are dealing with the love that is inherent in the logical process, this is a very important step between these two. It is so clear in the
overview of this line, which is called Self-defense. Modesty that is never confused with weakness. Think about the children who have the 15.6. They know that they are extreme and they don't see anything wrong
with that. They see it as their power in life and yet, of course, they will have to deal very quickly with the way in which society deals with extremes when they are not at the right time. So, they pull it back, Self-
defense, and they will go up and sit on the roof of the house and they will not let anybody bear witness to their extreme. They will think before they speak. They will wait. They will be still.

Like all sixth lines, there can always be that moment in the lifetime, young or old, in which the sixth line transcends its apathy and becomes involved. After all, that is the wave in the sixth line, apathy/sympathy.
That apathy can simply go away in the moment where that wisdom, that potential in the sixth line, is of value to bring out the extreme because the extreme will actually lead to a pattern that is viable for all of
humanity. Remember, what we are looking at here is the love that guides us so that the patterns we have in the future, we can trust as much as you can.

Pluto exalted. Constant reexamination to weed out the weakest aspect. Oh, are these people good at pointing things out because they are extreme in the sense that, as a sixth line, they can look at the
spectrum of an extreme. They have a very good eye, in that sense.

Venus in detriment. A tendency to use harmony as a weapon in problem situations rather than focusing on the root causes. In the white book: The power of the Self to ignore the weakest point in favor of harmony.
Because, very early in their life, they recognize their power, that they are not weak, they always recognize weakness. In doing so, they are either apathetic about it or the moment that they are sympathetic about it
is the moment that they get into trouble. People don't like that pointed out to them. Of course, this is a fundamentally social gate. So they sit on the roof. There is no sense in bothering. I will think before I
speak.

Keep something in mind about our work in Human Design. It is a logical system and, as such, it is there to provide a framework in education for people so that they understand the basic mechanics of their
nature. The nature of love in the world has nothing to do with hugging and kissing, though all that is very nice, but with making sure that people are educated from the earliest possible age. Without that education,
human beings do not have a possibility to see that what they are is not an embarrassment. What they are is not something that has to be refined and improved, that it is not something that has to be perfected

Page 6

because it is exactly what it is supposed to be: an aspect of the totality, an aspect of the spectrum of things.

We have a false prophecy about the nature of love. Wre assume that we generate love in the world by loving each other. This is a funny thing because this has nothing to do with what this love is all about. It
has nothing to do with loving your guru, your friend or your dog. It has to be with being one with the creative process, accepting surrender for what it is to be you and seeing in that surrender your own
beauty. Only when you find surrender in your own beauty do you put love in the aura of the world. There is no other way. No matter how sweet and nice you are and how much love you have within yourself and
how much love you want to put out in the world, it is not going to change the aura of our planet. What changes the aura of our planet is human beings living their nature. That is the crux of what our work is, so
that human beings can just live out their nature without the morality, without the conditioning, to see clearly what it is just to be themselves. That creates love in the world. We won't see that in our time.

Page 7

ANALOGY FOR THE VESSEL OF LOVE

The Vessel of Love is one of the incarnation crosses comprised of four gates: the 15 (Modesty), the 46 (Pushing Upward), the 25 (Innocence), and the 10 (Treading).

The Vessel of Love is not something that is understood. We have a great deal of confusion about the nature of love. There are many ways in which love exists in the world. Most human beings are familiar
with love through what we call electro-magnetic connection: that love is a question of attraction and repulsion. The real nature of love is something that tends to be locked up with that attraction and
repulsion that we have in those kinds of interactions.

The ego and the Self ( the G center) are very different and the love of the ego, which is a possessive love, is very different than the love of the Self. The love of the Self is never something that is directly personal.
It has a great deal to do with oneself, but the real love is something that is a by-product of the way human beings live their lives. That is what real love means. So in looking at these four different gates, not only
will I try to bring you to a point that you see the nature of the lines, but also to keep in mind the nature of these gates of love and how they operate in the world.

In order to really understand the Vessel of Love, it is best to have an analogy and I use the analogy of a container for all four gates of the Vessel. You can call it a vessel. The container has an outside wall. Our
outside wall is what we call the aura. That is, you are penetrated the moment that somebody penetrates your aura. The outside wall, the aura, is the 15th gate, the love of humanity, which is in essence the
collective aura that adds up to the totality, but it is the surface of us. If you have a vessel and go inside the vessel, you have a wall on the outside, what we call the aura, but you also have a wall on the inside that
contains it. For us, it is no longer the aura; this becomes the flesh. That is, it becomes this enclosed sack that holds us all inside. This is the flesh. This is the container and the 46th gate is the love of the body, the
love of the flesh.

If you have a container with an outside and an inside wall and it is contained, you have to have something inside. What you have inside, in our case, is blood. What is really inside is what we call universal love,
the 25th gate. When you have all of that together, the love of humanity that creates the aura, the love of the flesh that creates the Maya and the blood that makes it all run with its spirit, you have to have some
place to go. The way that you go is that you take the Vessel and you pour it and when you pour it, it comes out through the lip which is the 10th gate because the 10th gate is the way. The way is the potential
to love oneself. So, in our work, we will take a look at these four aspects of the Vessel through each of the four gates.

Everything that is alive, every living thing right to the cellular level, all has the 15th gate. It is the only universal gate and it is an extraordinary thing. Over the lines, it gives you its nature. The quality of

something that can be seen individually, is collective.

This gate is not speaking of the individual behavior of the 10, but of the collective behavior of humanity.

Everything has to be part of the human drama. Everything. And it is here in the 15th gate that we get

15.5 Sensitivity

Fifth lines are what society wants to see a hexagram as being. It is about Sensitivity. Because the fifth line gets projected on that it is the extremist and that it is capable of extremes, it is also capable of rising to the
occasion or not. In other words, the fifth line has a kind of advantage, as many fifth lines do, that it does not have to be an extremist but it can certainly be an extremist when it is projected on that it is time to be
extreme. This is the way society likes it.

What society likes is the possibility that extremism can be tampered with in some way, based on the environment. For example: it is an historical phenomenon that we send young, relatively fresh, innocent
boys into wars and we tell them to become killing freaks. We turn them into extremes and then we expect them to turn that off when they come back because the environment does not require that anymore. All
these very gentle and noble people who, for centuries, were very polite and distinguished and then they go out in the battlefield and go absolutely nuts. Society likes the idea that an extreme is something that can
be handy when you need it but it can be torn down if the environment does not require it.

Here the line is called Sensitivity. The ability to sense when otherwise balanced behavior must be adjusted to meet the requirements of a changing environment. Jupiter exalted. The power to grow. In
other words, these people learn to live out their extremes in a way that is not offensive to the totality.
